videos.description: KiShawn Pritchett has a little space and knocks down a three to put Davidson ahead early against UNC.
videos.headline: Davidson's Pritchett buries triple

videos.description: Rusty Reigel hits a 3-pointer to put the Wildcats up 14-7 over the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Davidson's Reigel knocks down a three

videos.description: Kellan Grady comes away with the rebound and pulls up at the free throw line for the jumper.
videos.headline: Davidson's Grady pulls up in transition

videos.description: Brandon Robinson capitalizes off a Theo Pinson block with a bucket in transition.
videos.headline: UNC's Robinson scores in transition

videos.description: Kellan Grady pump fakes and hits a long two for the Wildcats.
videos.headline: Davidson's Grady fakes out defender for jumper

videos.description: Joel Berry II knocks down a 3-pointer for the Tar Heels to put them ahead by five.
videos.headline: UNC's Berry buries a 3

videos.description: Kenny Williams gets the easy bucket after a beautiful assist from Theo Pinson.
videos.headline: UNC's Pinson drops dime to Williams

videos.description: Jon Axel Gudmundsson gets the tough bucket to go after taking contact to make it a one-possession game for the Wildcats.
videos.headline: Davidson's Gudmundsson goes high off the glass for score

videos.description: Kellan Grady rejects Luke Maye as the Wildcats are hanging tight with the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: Davidson's Grady comes up with huge block

videos.description: Theo Pinson helps UNC extend their lead with a big and-1.
videos.headline: UNC's Pinson gets bucket and a foul

videos.description: Luke Maybe comes up with the offensive rebound and slams it for the Tar Heels.
videos.headline: UNC's Maye slams home offensive rebound

videos.description: Roy Philpott and Jason Capel breakdown UNC's 85-75 win over Davidson.
videos.headline: Berry, Maye lead UNC to victory
